009package imagingbook.common.util.progress;
010
011import imagingbook.common.filter.generic.GenericFilter;
012
013/**
014 * Interface for defining tasks that may be queried (monitored) to report their
015 * current progress status. Monitored objects (tasks) must only implement method
016 * {@link #getProgress()}, which returns the current completion status. See
017 * {@link GenericFilter} for an example.
018 * 
019 * @see ProgressMonitor
020 * 
021 */
022public interface ProgressReporter {
023        
024        /**
025         * Returns a value in [0,1) indicating to which degree this
026         * task is complete.
027         * @return a value between 0 and 1
028         */
029        public double getProgress();
030
031}
